summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1291 for the improvement of Twenty-sixth Avenue, from the south line of Tract J. of the S. B. Yesler Donation Claim Tracts to the south line of J. H. Rengstorff's Addition; Twenty-fifth Avenue, from East Cherry Street to the south line of J. H. Rengstorff's Addition; East Columbia Street, from Twenty-fifth Avenue to the west line of Stander Addition; East Marion Street, from Twenty-fifth Avenue to the west lien of Stander Addition, all in the City of Seattle, by grading and by constructing concrete sidewalks, together with all necessary appurtenances, under Ordinance No. 14075, and levying and assessing the amounts therefor against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown on said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
